name: Survival 3d Action
description:
Survival is a game about surviving in the open world of soldiers how survive after apocalypse and fighting for the lives.
Huge open world full of surprises, military bases and many others.
Try to survive if can

Features:
- High detalised open world with terroirist bases and old villages
- Animated world with helicopters, soldiers and 4x4 SUV
- Real physic


Like us at Facebook and VK and stay tuned with all new games and updates
https://www.facebook.com/smartmovegames
